mapper.insert: insert into t_food_base (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODNAME, FOODTYPE, FOODDESCRIPTION, FOODNO, FOODCOUNT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fooddescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodcount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_food_base set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODNAME = #{foodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODTYPE = #{foodtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODDESCRIPTION = #{fooddescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODNO = #{foodno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODCOUNT = #{foodcount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODNAME, FOODTYPE, FOODDESCRIPTION, FOODNO, FOODCOUNT from t_food_base where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODNAME, FOODTYPE, FOODDESCRIPTION, FOODNO, FOODCOUNT from t_food_base
